CHAT.comment: Freeplay. Mother and Child sit on the living room floor playing with a box of experimenter provided toys. They play first with a small truck with shapes that fit in the sides and the top. They they play with Cookie Monster and Bert puppets. Most of what Child says is intelligible.

u.a: starts to put shape in door in truck .
most utterances in deep puppet voice .
gets up and starts to run away .
all in puppet voice , tickles Child .
switches from Ernie puppet voice to Cookie Monster puppet voice .
takes Cookie Monster puppet off Mother's hand .
